home.description: Where every bite tells a story of warmth, love, and exceptional taste. Discover our handcrafted delights made with the finest ingredients.
home.aboutText: {{companyName}} is a family-owned bakery dedicated to creating the most delicious homemade treats. Every product is crafted with love and the finest ingredients.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our bakery

hours.question: What are your operating hours?
hours.answer: We're open Monday to Sunday, 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM. We're here to serve you fresh baked goods every day!

custom.question: Do you take custom orders?
custom.answer: Yes! We love creating custom cakes and treats for special occasions. Contact us at least 48 hours in advance.

delivery.question: Do you offer delivery?
delivery.answer: Currently, we offer pickup only. However, we're working on delivery services coming soon!

vegetarian.question: Are your products suitable for vegetarians?
vegetarian.answer: Most of our products are vegetarian-friendly. Check product descriptions for specific dietary information.

order.title: Order Details
order.error: Failed to submit order. Please try again.

common.newsletterText: Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive deals and fresh bakery updates!
common.featuredDescription: Discover our most loved creations, crafted with passion and the finest ingredients
common.aboutDescription: From our signature chocolate cakes to delicate pastries, every item in our bakery tells a story of tradition, innovation, and pure deliciousness.
